column1: sliced for four short and wide outside off, given lots of room. Rohit didn't try to keep it on the ground, just sliced it above point for four
tried to correct his line and strikes Rohit with a slightly painful blow on the waist. Angling into the batsman, he manages to deflect it to square leg
loud shout but the angle was perhaps taking it down leg. Oh and a big inside edge too. Full ball, into the batsman at almost yorker length
length ball on off, he punches it off the front foot to cover
given some room outside off and tries to stroke it through the gap, but gets it only off the end of the bat, and it rolls to cover
length ball, angling into him, defended towards mid-on

welcomes him to the attack with a sumptuous cover drive for four. All those adjectives people use for Rohit - elegant, classy, talented - were on display. overpitched on off and he sent it purring to the fence
pulls his length back a bit, and gets it angling into Rohit, who had taken a half-step down the pitch. Lets it go through to the keeper
very wide outside off, but just inside the white lines, so safe. Rohit leaves it well alone
fuller on the stumps, defended towards cover. They briefly think about a single but decide against it
sticks to that wide line outside off, while keeping it just short of being called 'wide'. Rohit lets it go through again
similar ball, same result. Hint of some movement for Holder too
length outside off, steered to point with an open bat face
full on the stumps, punched back to the bowler
overpitched, and caressed through extra cover. Good way for Dhawan to get off the mark
fuller outside off, guided to point
fuller on off, he plays it with an angled bat but straight to cover
length ball on off, steered towards point, who runs in and swoops down on the ball to prevent any thoughts of a single
steered it past backward point and they run through for a comfortable single
beaten full ball, angling across, Dhawan goes for the drive and ball whistles past the outside edge
length ball on the stumps, punched to cover
full ball on the legs, he tried to flick it away but couldn't make connection. It rolls off the bat and pad
with Rohit back on strike, Holder goes back to bowling wide of off. Rohit happy to leave
flirted with the line outside off too much, and is called 'wide' that time
gets the line right that time, so it's back to Rohit shouldering arms to let it go through
length ball on off, defended to the offside
full on the legs, and he flicks it. The ball hung in the air for a while, but fell well short of Holder at mid-on, who didn't collect cleanly and allowed a comfortable second
full on the stumps, he tucks it between midwicket and mid-on and calls Rohit through for a quick single
edged, but short of slip gets it to straighten a touch and bounce a bit higher, but Rohit plays it with soft hands, and it doesn't carry to slip
bye bye ball Rohit shows the bowler who's the boss. Steps down the track, and absolutely wallops that into the high tiers.
Edged again Roach is not going to stand for that sort of hitting, bowls it in a good spot again and draws the edge again. Falls short of slip again
strays on the pads and Dhawan just picks it up off his pads to flick it over square leg for six
tries to correct his line and goes outside off and a bit short. Dhawan chops it down on the ground, that was perhaps there to be hit
good length on off, he steers it to point
flayed that but straight to cover. Overpitched on off, and Dhawan went for a full-blooded drive, but hit it to the fielder. That would have stung
opens the face of the bat to push it past point, but the timing on that is excellent and the ball races across the turf, far enough for them to get a couple
given room outside off, and Dhawan slaps it to long-off
dismissed angling into the pads from around the wicket, too full. Dhawan times this to perfection, just picks it up off his legs and sends it soaring over the square leg fence
full on the stumps, defended from the front foot. The ball drops at his feet and he considers the single, but is sent back by Rohit
back of a length on off, defended to point
overpitched on off and Dhawan strokes it to mid-off's left
short ball on off, Rohit pulls to square leg. Rolls his wrists to keep it down
good length outside off, Dhawan shoulders arms
length ball on off, a bit of turn into the batsman, played with a horizontal bat to cover
no turn that time, slightly back of length on off, pushed to cover
length on off, defended to point
goes fuller and Rohit moves across to flick it to long-on
that's some great timing from Dhawan. Slightly short, angling into the batsman and on the stumps, but he cuts it from the stumps and it races past point
comes on the front foot and chips it over the in-field. Well over mid-off's head and the timing is on point again, as the ball races to the fence
ends changed but tactics stay the same. Wide outside off on a length, and Rohit watches it go to the keeper
goes fuller in length but sticks to the same line. Same result too
when you flirt with the line, you will sometimes cross it. Too far outside off and called a wide, rightly so.
the line has got Rohit walking across a bit. Full ball and stroked well, but straight to point
the batsman stays still that time and watches the good length ball go to the 'keeper
that was in Rohit's reach, and he stays on the back foot to square drive it past the inner circle. But there is a man on the point fence
angling into the batsman, guided to backward point
comes down the track but gets a leading edge that rolls away towards point
stays back to this, and slaps it to point from outside off
shorter ball, slight turn into the batsman. He stays in his crease and opens the face of the bat to guide it to short third man
way down leg and Dhawan wanted to sweep it into the stands. gets a trickle on that though, and it goes off the keeper's pads for one run. Would have been wide if left alone
uses his wrist to turn it into the square leg region for a comfortable single
angling in, on the stumps, he cuts it to point
too wide outside off, left alone, and going just over the tramlines
aimed at off stump, and full to go along with it. Rohit trods forward and defends
full outside off, searching for the swing, but all of that is now gone. Driven through the covers to the fielder in the deep
length ball outside off from round the wicket. Defended off the back foot to the off side
full outside off, and defended off the front foot. Soft hands
length ball angling across Shikhar, and he slaps a cut past the infield. Fabian Allen needs to run around the boundary to stop that
smacked through the infield! Width offered outside off, and he frees his arms to place this beautifully through the infield
short and that's going down the leg side as Dhawan shapes up to pull. Goes over his gloves, and Hope can't hold on to it either. Lucky he didn't get called for a wide as well
short outside off, and he drags a pull through the midwicket region! Not short enough and Dhawan pummels that with disdain
good length outside off, and it's been punched off the back foot. Dribbles away to cover
slower ball outside off, and Shikhar opens the bat's face to steer a shot towards point

And Keemo Paul does the Gabbar celebration to send Dhawan back! The audacity. Love it! Short outside off again, and Dhawan pulls this straight down midwicket's throat. A ball waiting to be punished, but Dhawan finds the only infielder on the leg side
short on middle, and going down the leg side. Kohli swivels and sees it go into Hope's gloves
back of a length outside off, and zipping off the surface and into Kohli's gut. Shapes up to defend, and he misses the shot
full just outside off, and caressed off the front foot towards cover
full just outside off, and straightening after hitting the deck. Kohli covers his off stump and rocks back to defend it back to the bowler
full just outside off, and Kohli puts his feet outside off stump, and defends with the straight bat to the non-striker
length ball on middle, and slightly slower from Holder. He shapes up to pull, but it comes off the bat's edge. Mistimed to the man in the deep
good length on off, and angling into his body. Nudged comfortably off his pads to square leg. Enough time to jog across for one
drops the length slightly. Lands outside off, and comes into off stump. He tiptoes and defends with soft hands towards the bowler
ramped over Hope! Short on off, and Rohit tracks the ball with his eyes and lets it get over his shoulder. Simply cuts it over the keeper thereafter, and that's almost gone for a six
good length outside off, and he dabs a late cut to third man for a single
yorker just otuside off, and he wedges a defensive shot down the ground. Well bowled, and confidently negated by Kohli
length ball from round the wicket. Lands on leg, and going across Kohli. Tries to cut, but too close to his body. Edged onto his own body
pulled, and pulled very fine! Short outside leg and he swivels to play this inside the line of the fielder at fine leg. Second boundary of the over
length ball outside off, and he wields the bat like a sword to cut this to deep point and keep the strike
and Roach is sent to the extra-cover boundary! Full and wide, and Kohli bends his back knee to lean into a perfect drive past cover
full outside off once again, but this time deep cover is positioned to intercept the cover drive. The fielder cleans up
length ball outside off, but too wide for the cut shot. Off the bat's toe end to point as they scamper across for a single
deceived! Slower one from Roach. Length ball outside off, but doesn't bounce as much as Kohli expected. Under his bat as he shapes up to pull
pulled almost to fine leg! Falls just short of the man in the deep. Short ball originating from outside off, and Kohli keeps his eyes on the ball to attack it. Slightly top edged
length ball outside off, and he sticks his bat out to smother a square cut to the fielder at the boundary. Drinks
good length outside off, and he looks to cut. Extra bounce forces the ball to go above his bat
full just outside off stump. He smothers a push to cover with soft hands
length ball on middle, and he tiptoes to nudge this off his hips to deep backward square
shoulders his arms! Rarity in ODIs after the ball gets slightly old. Full outside off, and he covers his off stump and leaves the delivery
good length outside off, and he muscles a late cut to the third-man fielder whose placed pretty square

caressed through the covers, and the Kieran Powell needs to slide across the ground near the boundary before parrying it back. Did his back leg hit the skirting? The third umpire wants to have a look. They're still checking. With a tied game couple of days ago, you can't risk not ensuring the correct decision is eventually reached.
short and wide outside off, and Rohit reaches out to slap a square cut through the infield. Sweeper cleans up
length ball outside off, and slapped off the back foot. But the cut is top edged to third man
length ball outside off, and slapped off the back foot to third man. Slightly late onto that shot though

no hundred for Kohli today! Length ball outside off, and Kohli tries to dab this down to third man. Plays it inside the line of the ball as the ball seams away. Open face of the bat, and the delivery ensures it takes the outside of his bat. Stunned silence at the CCI
back of a length on middle, and he nudges this off his hips to square leg with soft hands. Off the mark
full outside off, and angling in. But Rohit covers his off stump and then shoulders his arms
yorker to start the over. Rayudu looks to wedge the ball out, but he inside-edges the shot right onto his boots! Ouch
short outside off, but nowhere near the batsman's body. Left alone by Rayudu
length ball outside off, and left alone once again
short on off, and Rayudu sways to get away from the line of the ball
full outside off, and angling away after hitting the deck. Teasing delivery as Rayudu comes forward to drive with the angled bat. But he misses the shot
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to muscle a perfect cover drive through the infield! Powell in the deep has no chance either
length ball outside off, and he shapes up to pull along the ground to deep midwicket
full just outside off, and he waits for the delivery to get to him, before opening the face and guiding it down to third man. Safe play
full just outside off stump, and defended off the front foot towards the off side. Soft hands on display
left alone by Rohit. Wide outside off, and angling in. He lets it go after covering his off stump
good length outside off. Rohit tiptoes and sticks his bat out to punch towards cover
guided off the back foot to third man for a single
good length outside off, and tailing inwards after hitting the deck. Too close for the cut so Rohit opts to shoulder his arms. Nice carry into Hope's gloves
reaches almost towards the tramlines to try and drive away from his body. But he can't generate the power. The full-pitched ball is under-edged to the keeper on the bounce
attempts a yorker on off stump, and Rohit needs to get onto the back foot before shoveling the ball back with the straight bat
full just outside off stump, and Rohit firmly defends off the front foot to cover. The ball dribbles away to the fielder
slower ball, and Rohit is into the cut too early! But manages to clear the infield with a shot that was not in control. Man in the deep intercepts
back of a length on off, and he rides the bounce to defend off the back foot. Played from near his face
full just outside off stump, and defended off the front foot. Just 120kph this time. Defended onto his body
full on middle, and Rohit offers the bat's full face to caress a shot past the non-striker. Straight to long on

full outside off, and Rayudu sticks his bat out to guide a late cut to short third man. The fielder dives and saves it from going past, and Rohit is halfway down the wicket looking for the run. Rayudu promptly sends him back
wobbly running once again. Pushed off the back foot to mid off, and he calls early for the single. But they hesitate before deciding to scamper across
full just outside off, and Rohit covers his off stump before defending to Powell. Rayudu has backed up too much, and so dives back in a flash before Rovman can whip the ball onto the stumps
length ball outside off, and punched with the square face past point to the fielder in the deep
room outside off and he waits for the slower one and caresses it past point.
short ball and he's on to it in a flash. Picked up the length early and pulled it in front of square with authority. Raises a fine fifty. Plenty depends on Rohit now, with Kohli gone
inside edged on to the pad. Huge appeal by the bowler, but the umpire was rightly unmoved
stays in his crease and guides this exquisitely past point and to the fence. Third man had no chance running to his left
launched into a full-blooded cover drive but the man at cover was able to get his body behind the ball
wide outside off, but within permissible limits, and Rayudu watches it go through
stays in his crease and punches this through covers
full length on off, and he comes forward to defend with an angled bat
comes forward and pushes this to the left of cover
he's letting the ball come on to him. Stays in his crease and opens the face of the bat to punch-steer, and third man runs to his right to collect
takes a big stride forward and plays the ball close to his pad, driving it down to long-on
didn't come on with the pace he expected perhaps. Rohit was waiting in his crease to wrist it towards midwicket but the slowness means he can only tap it down back to the bowler
floated up outside off, he comes on the front foot and steers it to point
length ball on the stumps, Rohit works it around the corner
edged goes fuller and Rayudu tried to punch-drive it, but got a thick edge that rolled through the vacant slips and to the third man fence
pushed to cover off the back foot
on the stumps, not much turn, he stays back and dabs it into the offside
takes a big stride forward to meet the ball and drives it, but straight to mid-off
length ball on the stumps, he tries to turn it away but gets a soft leading edge that rolls back to the bowler
full on the pads, he plays it with a straight bat to mid-on
Fabian at point dives and stops a certain boundary Rohit cut it away with good timing, but Fabian dived to his right and got his hand to the ball
comes forward to push it to cover
driven from the crease, but can't get past cover
on the pads, but Rayudu can't find the gap with his flick. Goes straight to mid-wicket
comes forward and plays it with a straight bat into the covers
beaten Rohit thought that would turn a bit into him and stayed inside the line, trying to push, but it fizzed past the outside edge
loses his line and fires this way down leg
great placement. Beats the man at short cover with a back-foot slap that goes to the fielder's left
worked to midwicket
length on the stumps, pushed down to long-on
appeal for a stumping threw it wide of the stumps and drew Rayudu forward, but he was quick to drag his foot back across the line. In the nick of time as it turned out
Rovman loses his length and Rohit pounces. Too short and Rohit transfers his weight back and swivels to pull this to the square leg fence
delicate outside off and Rohit intentionally steers this fine. The timing is great once again and the ball races to the fence
goes on the back foot to push it down to long-on
given room outside off comes down the track and flays this, but there is a man on the cover fence
you can't bowl that length at that pace to Rohit in that form. too short, not quick enough, not bouncing enough and Rohit slaps it down to square leg for another boundary
worked to midwicket
cut to short third man
plays it back to the bowler with a straight bat
shows the full face again, but drives it down to long-on for a single
back of a length and some turn, Rohit stays back and punches to long-on
comes forward and steers it to cover's left
stays in his crease and punches it straight again, but the man at short midwicket dives and cuts it off
angling into the batsman, he slaps it to cover
comes down the track but the bowler spots it and pulls his length back. Some turn too, defended into the offside
down the track and gets hold of it. gave himself some room and got a full and free swing of the arms, sending the ball aeriel and between long-off and extra cover
stays back and punches this length ball down to long-on
works it away to midwicket off the back foot
pushed back to the bowler
comes forward to clip it to mid-on
exquisite timing slightly short and outside off, he stays back and sends it racing to third man off the face of the bat.
he can do it to different parts of the ground This time he punches it to the cover fence. The sweeper had run to his left in vain last ball. Ran to his vain to his right this time
slashes it but the man on the point fence collects
down the track, but the bowler pulled his length back, not giving Rayudu room to free his arms either. played to cover
comes down the track again, but Nurse is equal to it. Rayudu works this towards mid-on
full ball on the stumps, comes forward to defend
given some air and on a good length. Rohit plays it away towards point
Imperious there is no margin for error when Rohit is in such form. Drags this a touch short, a bit of room outside off. That's all Rohit needs to steer it to the point fence. Into the 90s
overpitched on the stumps, he flicks it to deep midwicket
he's coming down the track every ball is Rayudu. Manages to push it down to long-off that time
full on the stumps, driven straight to short cover
over long on! First ball from Nurse and Rayudu's skipping down the wicket. Confidently lifted over the fielder at long on
length ball on off, and spinning into his body. Nudged off his pads to deep backward square
good length just outside off, and steered off the back foot to third man
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to cover for a walking single
length ball on leg stump, and nudged off his hips once again. Tickled away to deep midwicket
full on middle, and pushed to long on after charging down the wicket. Long on intercepts
full on off, and once again using his feet to drive over the infield to extra cover
full just outside off stump, and defended with the bat's open face to cover. Soft hands

good length outside off, and turning away after hitting the deck. Rocks back and cuts square to reach his 21st ODI hundred! The crowd is on their feet, what more can you want on an otherwise drab monday afternoon? Rohit pumps the air in delight, Chahal and Jadeja applaud from the balcony
length ball outside off again, and enough time to cut square past point to the man in the deep
full on off, and he plonks onto the front foot to drive to long off
full on off stump, and defended with the turn to the bowler. Ball dribbles back to Allen
pulled between the two fielders in the deep! Short ball to start his spell, and Rayudu quickly swivels onto his toes and muscles a pull that threads the gap between fine leg and deep backward square
length ball just outside off stump. Opens the bat's face to run this down to third man. Enough time to walk across for one
Nataraja pull from Rohit. Length ball on off, and he raises his front leg to play this behind square with the horizontal bat
pulled in front of square! Short on off, and he skips down the wicket before thumping it over midwicket. A couple of bounces and into the boundary. Rayudu getting a move along now
steps out again, but Holder goes short outside off. Ramped to third man
good length just outside off, and punched off the back foot. Off the bat's top half, and rolling back to the bowler
full on middle, and driven with the bat's closed face to wide long on. Hetmyer manning the boundary there
length ball outside off, and straightening after pitching. Rohit makes room and glances a square cut, but only to the fielder at point
quicker from Allen. Skidding through after landing outside off, and cut behind square to point once again
straighter from Allen. Full on off, and smothered down the ground to long off for a walking single
good length on off, and he gets onto the back foot to shape up for a pull. Cramped for space on this occasion, but still manages to put it away to deep midwicket
tossed up on off stump, and driven nonchalantly to long off for a single with the bat's open face
back of a length outside off, and zipping into his body. Tiptoes and rides the bounce, and then cuts to point. Splices the shot this time
length ball angling into his pads, and clipped away to midwicket off the back foot. Played into the gap
full on leg stump, and worked with the use of his wrists to deep midwicket. Rayudu once down the ground once again
slammed off the back foot! Back of a length on off, but doesn't get big enough. Pulled off his chest
back of a length just outside off, and flat-batted off the back foot to mid off. Cramped for space
full toss on leg as Rayudu skips down the ground. Drills a shot from near his chest to long on after adjusting
length ball outside off, and defended off the back foot to Allen
extra flight outside off, and he drives down the ground to long off to complete another half-century!. His 10th in ODIs
full on middle stump, and pushed comfortably past the bowler's left to long off. Nice rotation of the strike from the duo here
full on middle, and whipped off his toes off the front foot. Hemraj at deep midwicket cleaning up
full on middle, and he drives this overpitched delivery to long off once again
length ball outside off. Rayudu shuffles across to the off side, and then punches past Rohit to long on

into the sightscreen! Rayudu does to Samuels what he did to Nurse a few overs ago. Full ball outside off stump, and he takes a big stride forward before lifting this flighted delivery right over the bowler's head
good length outside off, and cut off the back foot to third man. They scamper across for one
full on leg stump, and nudged off the front foot past the umpire at square leg
good length on off, and punched with the spin to long on after walking down the wicket
length ball on off. Rohit makes room towards the leg side, and then carves a punch through the covers to the boundary for four! Nurse's diving effort inside the circle just not good enough
full on off, and driven with the spin to long on

length ball on off, and Rohit walks down the ground to defend to point. The fielder tries to lob the ball back to Allen, but it's flown over the bowler's head, and that allows Rohit to eventually take the single
swept over square leg! Full outside off, and he drags this from beyond the stumps after taking a big stride forward
extra flight on off stump, and Rayudu makes room to lift this over the bowler. But he can't under it
inside out over cover! Smothered with the spin over the infield. Full outside off, and Rayudu skips down the wicket and uses the spin to his advantage
full just outside off, and punched to long off with the straight bat
overpitched on middle stump, and he shovels a straight drive past Allen's left to long off
a heavy ball, full on off, and driven to long off for a jogging single
length ball outside off, and carved off the back foot through the infield to deep extra cover
slower ball, well deceived. Full on off, and defended with the bat's open face to cover. Had to adjust after spotting the change in pace
overpitched, and that means Rayudu can't get under the ball. Wide outside off, and mistimed to cover for a single

full just outside off, and smacked over Paul's head! Rohit clears his front leg, swings through the ball's line, and it's in the stands! Goes past Sachin as the second-most prolific six-hitting for India in ODIs
yorker on middle, and kept away. Dribbles away to cover as they settle for a single
He can stroke them and tonk them full ball on the stumps, he extends his arms and sends the ball purring to the cover fence with a cover drive that ought to be framed

Oh my Rohit He's just paddled that, and for all the force he used it should have trickled away 10 yards. Instead, it's raced across the turf and crashed into the square leg fence. The man running around from deep midwicket puts in a despairing dive
that's almost an anti-climax. Searching for the yorker, Roach bowls a high full toss which is tapped down to long-off
if Rohit can, then why should Rayudu be left behind? Gets down on one knee and picks it up from outside off to slog-sweep it - once bounce and into the midwicket fence
goes wide outside off, ends up as a full toss. Rayudu threw his arms out at it, only got a faint touch. It beats the keeper and rolls on behind him
bowled right on the painted white lines, and Roach is thankful it's not called wide so he can gather his hat and end the over.
slower ball on off, he waits for it and guides it past backward point
that's way outside off and rightly called wide. Lost control of that, it pitched very short too
Ro-hitman in the house slower ball, back of a length. With the eye he has in form, Rohit would have spotted that from the moon. Waited on the back foot and swatted it disdainfully over midwicket
pats it to mid-on

that is just amazing placement yorker went wrong and resulted in a low full toss. Rohit seemed to merely pat it away for a single, but turned his wrists to open the face of the bat and bissect cover and extra cover
another full toss, but well wide of the stumps, Rohit reaches out and slashes it down to deep point
length ball on the stumps, tucked into the leg side
clobbered slower ball on the stumps, Rayudu bent low and smashed it way over wide long-on
comes down the track and hits it powerfully to the man on the cover fence
slower ball, tried for the yorker. Another low full toss, Rohit got only the bottom of the bat on it to cover
that is paddled standing up - and he gets his 7th 150-plus score in ODIs He just stood there and wiated for the ball, standing upright and paddled it to square leg's right
gets the yorker length almost right and Rohit digs it out to the offside
slashes it past point and into the fence. The only thing fielders can do - since the ball is invariably hit away from them - is put in despairing dives
down the track, but he fired that into his legs. Flicked to wide long-on
stand and smash stayed in his crease, waited for the ball, it landed full and on the stumps, it disappeared over long-on with a free swing of Rohit's bat
the bowler's rattled. Rohit takes a step down, and he fires it very wide outside off
gives himself a bit of room to cut but straight to point
very full but he mistimes the drive, gets an inside edge that rolls to mid-on

No 200 for Rohit this time wide outside off, he went to slash it again. No feet movement, perhaps the tiredness is setting in, and he only got a top edge that was taken by Hemraj, diving forward at short third man
picks it up from outside off to nurdle it down to long-on
short ball, on to Dhoni a bit quicker than he expected. Pings into his shoulder, beating the intended pull, and rolls to point
full toss outside off, slower ball. He waited and steered it down to third man
picked up from yorker length and hit straight back past the bowler. It looked like a modified helicopter shot, but he didn't twirl his bat to take the ball to midwicket, rather brought up straight
full toss on the pads, flicked to deep fine-leg
fetch that! another yorker or slower ball gone wrong ends up as a full toss. Rayudu goes across and swings hard and well, sending it over the head of deep midwicket
down the track, but he spotted him and fired it in short. Slapped to long-on with a horizontal bat
tried to fetch that from outside off and paddle it fine, but misses it altogether
stays in his crease that time, and cuts it down to the man at deep point.
similar shot, but hit more towards cover and straight to the man on the fence
back of a length and outside off, he stays back and slashes it to the man at deep cover.
tried to reverse sweep, but barely got any bat on it. The ball rolls down to short third man off the under-edge
head high no-ball Looked like it slipped out of his hand and went at beamer height to Rayudu, but much slower. Tried to ramp it but didn't connect. Free hit coming up

full toss, swung and hit hard but without the timing or placement that has served him so well before this. The fielder at long-on ran to his right and dropped it - though it wouldn't have counted as a catch off course, being a free hit
fuller on the stumps, driven down to long-on. Rayudu goes to 99
yorker, dug out to long-on

steered to point for a quick single and brings up Rayudu's third ODI hundred The dressing room stands and applauds, as does the rest of Brabourne. He was going at well below a run a ball, but he's got his century off just 80 balls. Textbook acceleration
wide yorker,but Dhoni had given himself room and steered it to the point fence off the face of the bat. That travelled quickly
on the pads, and Dhoni has no trouble flicking it down to fine leg for another boundary

direct hit ends Rayudu's innings came down the track, but the bowler shortened his length and Rayudu couldn't free his arms, ended up bunting it towards wide mid-off. Wonderful work by Fabian Allen to run to his right, pick up and throw down the stumps at his bowling end in one motion. Catches Rayudu well short and ends a superb innings
stays in his crease and drives it into the covers and in the gap
back of a length, flatter and quicker but still gets some turn. Dhoni turns it to midwicket off the backfoot
short and wide outside off, but Jadhav only under-edges it to point
flat and quick again, but straying on the pads a tad, and Dhoni slaps it down to square leg
given some air and pitched fuller on off, allowing Jadhav to drive fluently into the covers
slower bouncer outside off, Dhoni waits for it and cuts it down to a squarish third man.

dropped slower ball, Dhoni was looking to send it into orbit but only got the toe-end. It went high in the air but was dropping quickly. Fabian Allen at midwicket was running backwards and put in a full-length dive but couldn't hold on. Would have been a fabulous catch if he had

soft dismissal full ball on the pads, and Dhoni flicks it. Seemed to have got hold of it too, but it went straight to short fine leg. Anti-climatic dismissal, but the drop the previous ball hasn't cost West Indies much
short outside off, Jadeja rides the bounce to steer it down to third man
good bouncer outside off. Jadhav quickly pulled out of playing a shot, but the keeper can't hold on to it above his head and allows byes
full toss outside off, Jadhav stays still and wallops it over the infield and into the cover fence
full outside off, threw his bat at it, but not much timing. Bounces down to long-off
slower ball, but dragged it short. Jadhav waited for it and slashed it over point and into the fence
Full ball on the stumps, driven to deep cover
slower one again, and Jadeja picks it up this time. Dragged it short again and Jadeja waited for it and pulled it to square leg. Got the placement perfect
low full toss, clubbed from outside off to long-on
Jadhav finishes well full on the stumps and he digs it out to long-on. Sent it very straight and timed it perfectly
good length on middle, and shaping away from Hemraj. Tapped to cover, and they want a single, but Kohli's diving effort ensures its a dot ball
good length on leg stump, but once again angling across Hemraj. Defended off the back foot from outside off to the bowler
leading edge But just short of Kohli at cover. Length ball on middle, and he tries to nudge towards midwicket. Bat's face is closed, and he's lucky that he's still in the middle
good length on off, and pushed with the bat's open face past cover. Jadeja and Kohli give the ball a chase, but the former manages to parry it back before his captain
length ball outside leg stump, and he tries to flick it behind square. Misses, but collects the extra run for the wide
length ball angling across, and he pushes at this with hard hands. Takes the outside edge and flies past the cordon
pulled! And that rolls away to the deep midwicket boundary. Length ball on leg stump, and flicked off his hips over the infield
back of a length outside leg, but the angle meets the batsman in front of middle. Tiptoes and defends off the back foot
full on middle, and he shuffles towards the off side to defend. Pushed to mid off, but no chance of a single
good length on leg stump, and nudged with the angled bat to the gap near midwicket. They jog across for a single

swing and a miss. Full on middle, and Powell swivels to pull. But the ball stays low, and hits his knee-roll. Impact's in front of off stump, but would've definitely missed the stumps. Rohit dives at first slip to ensure West Indies can't collect a leg bye
beautiful shape! Fuller from Bumrah, and Powell looks to drive from off stump. But the ball angles away, and sneaks past the outside of his bat. Great seam position too
good length on leg stump, and the straight-batted defense takes the outside edge to point. Drops just short of the fielder
full on off, and driven away from his body to cover. Straight to the fielder
length ball on leg stump, and he looks to whip it off his pads to the leg side. Minimal movement of the feet, and the ball hits above the knee roll
full outside off, and angling further away. Outswing on offer after going past the batsman and Dhoni needs to dive forward and collect the ball
full on leg, and driven with the swing to mid off. Straight to the fielder. A good return over from Bhuvi so far
length ball shaping away from Hemraj, and he frees his arms to slap a cut past the infield! Flies into the boundary. Just that extra width and punished by the opener
back of a length outside leg stump, and he tries to flick behind square. Just past his hips, and Dhoni races to his right to intercept
short-arm jab! Length ball on leg, and he thumps a controlled punch over midwicket and into the stands. Shades of Yuvraj in that shot
through him! Length ball on off, and jagging inwards after hitting the deck. Powell defends outside the ball's line, and the delivery sneaks under his bat
good length on leg, and the angle makes Powell meet the ball in front of middle. Tries to defend with soft hands, but he's inside-edged it onto his body
good length on middle stump, and he tries to punch straight. But the ball takes some extra bounce, and hits him near his waist
length ball on middle, and the straight-bat defense takes the outside edge. Flayed to point

big appeal for caught behind but umpire Chaudhary remains stoic. Dhoni says 'I heard something, 100%.' and that's enough for Kohli to review. It was a length ball outside leg that jagged inwards as Powell tried to defend. Goes between bat and body, and it has touched something on the way to the keeper, but that's the back leg. Pitching outside leg too, so they're not checking for the lbw.
overpitched outside off, enticing Powell to drive. The ball's gone past him by the time he brings his bat down for the shot
good length on middle, and the ball stays low! Tries to punch with the straight bat, but it goes through to the keeper on the bounce
full outside off, and that's been plucked out of thin air! Reaches forward to try and lift a drive over cover, but Rayudu tiptoes and times his jump to perfection and gives India the breakthrough
full on off, and he gets onto the back foot to defend towards the bowler. Covers his stumps early
Kuldeep with a direct hit! Defended off the back foot to mid on, and Kuldeep picked the ball and threw it in one single motion. Hope's diving effort is simply not good enough! Gone for a duck

through him once again! West Indies livin' dangerously. Length ball on off, and jagging inwards after hitting the deck. Tries to punch but falls over because he loses his balance, and the ball sneaks under his bat
length ball on middle, and defended with the straight bat to mid on
good length outside off, and angling away after hitting the pitch. Samuels shoulders his arms

hara-kiri! Nonchalantly reverse-flicked from cover, and the ball rolls onto the non-striker's stumps! Samuels defended this to Kohli and Powell was looking for the single. Uses his wrists to flick it and it hits middle stump. Powell's nowhere near the crease
length ball angling in from outside off. Defended with the straight bat, and the outside edge takes it down to third man
length ball on middle, and going across Hetmyer. Shoulders his arms
good length on leg stump, and tapped off the front foot to cover. Soft hands from Hetmyer
short outside leg, and Hetmyer backs away trying to free his arms. Pulled over the infield, but it doesn't have the legs to reach the boundary. Jadhav chases after it
good length just outside off, and left alone
length ball outside off, but tailing in. Covers his off stump and defends off the back foot to point
length ball outside off, and defended with the ball angling into his pads. Played to the off side
fuller ball outside off. Samuels shapes up to drive through the covers, but a bit of inswing forces the shot to fly off his inside edge and onto the leg side
good length on off, and he covers his off stump by shuffling across. Defended towards the leg side off the back foot
good length outside off, and dabbed off the back foot to third man for a walking single. Bhuvi misses out on the maiden
full outside off, and he crunches a front-foot drive to Bhuvi at mid off. Struck well, but not in the gap
length ball on off, and nudged away to the leg side. Early call for a single this time, and Samuels gets off strike
full on middle, and angling across the left-hander. Defended with the bat's open face to cover. Carefully played
backs away, and muscles it over cover! Length ball on middle, and he opens his stance to go over the infield. Played with the bat's open face, and one bounce into the boundary
good length on leg, and he makes room on the leg side to try and pull. Smacked hard, but straight to Jadhav at midwicket
full on middle stump, and clipped away to the leg side! Perfect timing off the bat, and the ball races away to the midwicket boundary
length ball outside off, and punched uppishly through the covers! Jadeja gives it a chase, but that's a futile one. Elegantly played
good length outside off, and defended with the bat's open face. Steered to point
good length on off, and zipping inwards after hitting the surface. Tickled fine off his hips to fine leg
length ball outside off, and cut late past the slip cordon with the bent knee. Played along the ground to third man
full on off, and shoveled down the ground with the straight bat. Can't beat mid on though
full on off, and whipped off the front foot past Kuldeep at wide mid on! Four written all over it after it beats the infield

could've struck first ball! But the edge doesn't carry. Length ball outside off, and he tries to defend at this. But the ball doesn't come in as much as Hetmyer expected, and the tickle off the outside edge lands just in front of MSD
full on off, and he clears his front leg to swing over mid off. Outside edge takes it right over point, and the ball falls in no man's land

slow finger of death from the umpire but Hetmyer reviews. Length ball, slower ball and coming into Hetmyer's pads. Tries to defend towards the leg side but the ball beats his bat and hits his back leg. Impact's on middle stump, this should be crashing. Ball-tracking, however, says 'clipping middle stump'... so West Indies keep the review, but Hetmyer must walk back
full outside off, and shaping away from the right-hander. Left alone

beautiful ball! Shades of Irfan Pathan. Full on off, and shaping into the right hander. Looks to drive through the covers, but the ball nips back and goes between bat and body. Almost clipped off stump there
good length on off, and punched to mid off
full ball on the stumps, driven from the crease to cover
length ball angling in too much and ends up on the pads, tapped into the leg side
full ball outside off, he goes for the big drive. Died on Kohli at cover as it went past him. Tough to call it a catch perhaps
tossed up more on the stumps, played to mid-on
length ball, some turn, hit back with a straight bat
leading edge, trickles down past mid-on. He was intending to play it between square leg and midwicket
back of a length on the stumps, plays it off the back foot towards mid-on
play and a miss. length ball angling across him. Too close to cut
through him! angled across, pitching on off and straightens. Goes like a homing missile through the gap between expansive bat and pad. West Indies are sinking fast
rapped on the pads and huge appeal Khaleel was very excited by the appeal, but Holder was hit on the thigh pad and he's tall. Probably going over
full on the legs and clipped to the left of midwicket
too full and Samuels picks it up off his toes and goes over mid-on's head for a  much needed four
full on the stumps, squirted to backward point
length ball on the stumps, defended with a straight bat
gives himself room and drives it nicely through the covers
turn for Jadeja pitched on a length and gripped and turned past the bat. Dhoni's whipped off the bails quick as a flash, but Samuels had dragged his back foot back
flighted on the stumps, he drives it down to long-on

full on the stumps, coming in with the angle, Holder inside-edges it to short fine leg and they go through for the single. Dhoni steers the ball on the stumps with his glove, but Holder was well in at the striker's end
goes through the batsman again. Over the wicket angling in and straightening a touch to go between bat and pad. Misses the stumps though and Dhoni collects
length ball, still getting some movement. Holder nudges it out towards midwicket
length ball angling across, he pushes it into the covers

skilful bowling from the rookie he's been bringing them back in so far, but this one went with the angle. Samuels went for the drive but it flew off his outside edge. Rohit at first slip makes no errors and holds the ball safely over his head
great length again, and he gets in line behind the ball to defend with a straight bat
angled across again, he gets behind it and defends
angled onto the pads, and played away towards mid-on
full ball given some air, driven to long-off
tossed up and full on the stumps, dug out to short cover
length ball and some turn away from the batsman, punched down to long-on
given some air again but slightly too full. flicked to long-on
nicely tossed up and dipping. Pitches and beats the intended drive. Jadeja's finding turn when he gets his length and speed right
patted back to the bowler
length ball on the stumps, he goes deep into his crease to tuck it down to fine leg
angled across, and he pushes it with the angle to the left of where cover would have been
good length again, and the batsman defends it watchfully
gets his line a bit off that time, strays on the pads and is flicked to deep midwicket
angled across, he tried to slash at it outside off but the ball goes under the bat.
fired into the pads again, and tapped down to long-on
flat on a length on the stumps, and defended back
length ball, he plays in the direction of the spin to hit to cover
short of a length outside off, played with a horizontal bat into the covers
quicker one hits him on the pads and he belts out an appeal, but that would have missed leg for sure
length ball on off, cut to short third man
length ball on off, pushed into the offside
nicely timed bowls a half-volley on off stump, and he leans into the cover drive that races to the fence
length ball on off, pushed to mid-off
back of a length outside off, steered to point
short ball rising up to shoulder height. Tries to pull it, but no timing. The ball rolls away off the under-edge
back of a length on off, punched to cover, where Kohli misfields and allows a single
given some air, on the stumps, gently driven to mid-off
tossed up nicely on off, he goes for the big drive but is beaten in flight. Gets an inside edge that runs down to fine leg
flighted on the stumps but overpitched, driven to long-off with a big stride out
a bit flatter and more wide of off, driven fluently through extra cover
They still can't read Kuldeep's googly Went for the big drive, got the outside edge, and Rohit is infallible in the slips. Takes this low to his left while half-diving
flighted ball dips and turns, hits him on the pad from a length. Half-appeal, but that would have missed leg
fuller on the stumps, driven back
back of a length outside off, coming in a touch. Defended to mid-off
good length on off, Bumrah's natural angle is one that comes a bit in to the right-hander. The batsman uses that to push it down to long-on
length ball on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
back of a length outside off, punched through cover off the back foot
length ball outside off, squirts it to point
full outside off, and swept with the spin to the backward square boundary! Nurse holds his right shoulder immediately after that shot. He's still in pain. Writhing really
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend with his top hand. Gets his bottom hand off the bat in a bid to reduce his pain
length ball outside leg, looking for the googly. Nudged off his hips to third man, and he runs across for a couple while protecting his right arm. Looks like an injury to his pectoral muscles
full just outside off, and defended with the front foot. Takes his bottom hand off the handle as he plays the shot

full on middle, and the googly goes through everyone! Rohit - from slip - goes chasing after it, and does extremely well to pull the ball back. Nurse did try to sweep, but it hit his back leg and then through the cordon
tossed up outside off, and he caresses a cover drive through the infield to wide long off
length ball on off, and punched down the ground to long off for a single
muscled over long on! Full outside off, and Holder reaches out and thumps this over Jadeja's head. Bumrah's near the boundary but he falls over while seeing the ball go over his head
length ball just outside off. Turning away, and edged off the outside of the bat to third man. Manish Pandey - the sub - gives it a chase
length ball on middle, and Holder backs away and then flays an inside-out lift over cover. West Indies go past 100.
full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
tossed up on middle, and drilled back to Jadeja. Wants to flick the ball onto the non-striker's stumps, but chooses not to after seeing Nurse back in his crease
full outside leg, and skidding through. Tries to sweep, but misses. Impact's outside leg stump too so no lbw appeal
full on middle, and turning away from the right hander. Takes a big stride forward to meet the ball and pushes it to cover
tossed up on off stump, and pushed off the front foot to cover. Holder wants the run, but Nurse says 'no'

c Rohit b Kuldeep once again! Length ball on middle, and the googly goes away from Nurse. Tries to free his arms and cut a shot behind square, but the edge flies to first slip. Nurse winces in pain after getting out. He's holding his right hand while walking back to the dugout
full on off, and swung across the line! Muscled over midwicket, and that's an excellent way to get off the mark. He's not hanging around
full on middle, and the googly is smothered with soft hands towards the off side
full on off, and turning away after hitting the deck. Defended off the front foot to the bowler
good length on off, and punched off the back foot to cover. Holder says no to the single
length ball on off, and nudged off the back foot with the use of his wrists to the leg side
good length on middle, and coming into his pads. Punched to long on
full just outside off stump, and he covers his off stump to defend
length ball on middle, and he backs away to thump a cut to wide long off. They walk across for one
flatter on off, and skidding straight through. Paul tries a might heave but the ball goes under his bat and into MSD's pads
deposited into cow corner! Short ball on leg stump, and he clears his front leg to swing across the line. Thumped!
length ball outside off, and spinning away from the batsman. Flat-bats a pull over the non-striker to long on
full on middle, and he wedges a drive to long off for walking single
full on middle, and he backs away to lift it over cover. Inside-edge takes the ball towards square leg
length ball on middle, and defended off the back foot to the bowler
full on middle, and defended off the front foot. Soft hands sends this back to the bowler
good length on off, and coming into his body. Tapped off the back foot to the bowler
length ball outside off, and turning away from the right-hander. Tapped with the angled bat to point
full just outside off, and straightening after pitching. Big stride forward to defend
full on middle, and he defends with hard hands. The ball pops into the air, but Holder gets in the way of Jadeja's line. Ball falls short. Nothing illegal there from the non-striker
length ball on middle, and defended back towards Holder to see the over out
full on middle, and the legbreak is defended back to Kuldeep
good length on middle, and punched off the back foot to long on. They walk across for a single
full on middle, and defended back to the bowler. Smothers the spin this time
full outside off, and driven away from his body. Takes the inside edge to short fine leg
full on leg stump, and nudged off his toes to square leg for a single
good length outside off, and defended off the back foot to cover. Dhawan scampers to his right to intercept
muscled over long on! Flat maximum and West Indies save the record of their worst ODI defeat. Full on off stump, and he gets under the ball to smack it right into the advertising board
full on off, and muscled over the non-striker again. Lands just short of Bumrah at long on, that went like a rocket
that's a biggie! Off the bat's sweet spot. Tossed up on off, and slog-swept into orbit on the leg side
slower through the air. Full outside off, and defended towards point off the front foot

MSD whips the bails! And Keemo Paul is walking even before the third umpire can make the decision. Drawn forward by a length ball outside off, misses the defense because the ball is turning away, and then the keeper spends absolutely no time in disrupting the stumps. Windies nine down
full just outside off, and defended with soft hands to see the over out
full outside leg stump, and he misses the attempted sweep. Hits his front leg, but impact is nowhere near the stumps
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to cover. Dhawan intercepts
full on leg stump, and that's an inswinging delivery! Over 100kph from Kuldeep, and the ball hits his front leg as he tries to flick
full just outside off, and he drills a drive to cover. Dhawan misfields, and that means Bhuvi has to attack the ball from long off
full just outside off, and turning away from the batsman. Misses the defensive shot, and MSD collects
tossed up on off stump, and blocked by Roach to see the over out
full outside off from round the wicket. Driven to Dhawan at cover but can't find the gap
dropped by Dhawan at cover! Cut away from his body and this is in the air. Going to Dhawan very slowly, but he's lost sight of the ball
full just outside off, and pushed off the front foot to the bowler
length ball outside off, and he backs away to flat-bat a shot past the bowler to long off
full outside off, and turning further away. Roach sticks his bat out, but it doesn't find the edge
full on off, and he defends with soft hands to see the over out again
tossed up on middle, and he caresses a front-foot drive to long off. They walk across for one. Can Holder get his fifty?
tossed up on middle, and the straight drive takes the outside edge! But it's just past Rohit's right to third man
full outside off, and drilled to wide long off. They jog across for another single
tossed up on middle, and flayed with the angled bat to deep extra cover. Nobody in the deep, and Holder collects a boundary to move on to 47
flatter on middle, and skidding through. Punched off the back foot to Kohli at midwicket
good length outside off, and turning into his body. Pushed with the bat's open face to cover and he calls for a quick single
full just outside off, and pushed with the angled bat to Jadeja at point. That half-century will have to wait
attempted yorker on middle, and driven to mid on. Wants a quick single, and he gets across before Dhawan could pick up the ball
back of a length outside off, and testing Roach's short-ball skills. Defended off the back foot after shuffling across to cover his stumps
full outside off, and driven to point. Jadeja collects it on the bounce but does some playacting like he's taken the catch. All in jest
yorker on off and he does well to wedge a defensive shot away to the off side. Offers the bat's full face
length ball outside off, and flying past Roach's shoulders to the keeper
good length just outside off, and fended with soft hands to point. Enough time to jog across for a single and that's his seventh ODI fifty!
full outside off, and he prods forward to defend towards cover
length ball just outside off, and blocked off the back foot. Played to cover
and slower from Jadeja. Defended off the back foot from outside off stump to cover
full outside off, and turning away. Defended with the bat's open face to the off side
and Jadeja does exactly that. Full on off, and nudged off his pads to the leg side

big appeal for lbw! But the umpire says no. Full on middle stump and he misses the defensive shot off the back foot. Hits his front leg and dribbles away to the leg side. They scamper across for a single, and there's a direct hit at the bowler's end. Roach is in... by a country mile
full on off, and he toe-ends a defensive shot into the pads. Goes onto the back foot to try and keep this ball away
length ball outside off, and angling into off stump. Defended off the back foot towards the bowler
slower ball, overpitched outside off. Tapped late past backward point to Jadhav at third man
attempted yorker that doesn't land right. Full on off, and drilled down the ground to mid off
back of a length outside off, and he rides the bounce to tiptoe and flat-bat a pull down the ground. Intercepted by mid on
extra flight and that makes it a full toss. Clipped off his boots to deep backward square leg for a walking single
flighted on middle, and he drills a straight drive past the non-striker's left to long off
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot. Soft hands, and the partnership has now lasted 40 balls!
full on off, and turning into the batsman's pads. Misses the defense, and hits his front leg. A hopeful appeal from Kuldeep, but umpire Gould says no
extra flight outside off, and the googly goes away from Roach. Tries to drive, but the bat is nowhere near the ball. MSD whips the bails off, but Roach is alright
full outside off, and the defensive shot takes the pad and flies over to the leg side. Kuldeep appeals again, but the umpire has already given it a legbye
good length outside off, and angling away. Throws his hands at it, and cuts this square to point for a single
good length outside off, and he tries to punch away from his body. Misses, through to the keeper
length ball on the stumps, played back towards the bowler

Khaleel thinks he's ended the game, starts celebrating almost as soon as ball hits pad. But it clearly pitched outside leg. He has a massively disappointed expression on his face, but when he watches the replays he'll know why that wasn't given
too full and driven to mid-off, where the man has to run to his left to clean up
length ball on the stumps, tucked into the leg side
length ball on off, and turning into his pads. Looks to defend off the front foot, but the punch takes the inside edge to deep backward square
Rohit Sharma beat West Indies by nine runs! Length ball on middle, and the googly goes past Roachs' outside edge and clips the top of off stump!
